attributes.comment:
Please raise the cost of applying for citizenship. It is far too cheap and the
immigrants who do not serve in the military do not appreciate what it is to be a US
citizen. US citizens can not work in other nations as my son has discovered. The
immigrants can stay in their own shitholes and leave us alone. My grandfather
was not permitted to vote until 1934 and his people had been here for 30 thousand
years. Limit immigration even more and stop allowing HB status. Our young
people are more than willing to work any job. All my life I have been undercut by
immigrants who will work for a few dollars an hour. Maybe the price should be
quadrupled.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adelaide Steely
